title: Lux is so god damn annoying holy shit
body:
I don't think I need to say anything. I don't have any room in bans for this %%%%.

She never needed buffs holy crap, i'm tired of this super ranged ap caitlyn on steroids, who has insane objective control and able to zone melee units harder than a 1000 attack  ranged teemo.

Once she lands 1 god damn spell (which isn't very hard being they're like buses flying at you) she splurges her whole load at you and if you survive that its gonna happen again real soon.
